DataListSpec.Name: Constituent Count By County Data List
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing constituent count by county records.
DataListSpec.Author: IUF Development

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_IUF_USP_DATALIST_CONSTITUENTCOUNTBYCOUNTY as set nocount on;
select replace(lower(replace(A.COUNTYCODEID_TRANSLATION, ' ', '')), 'parish', '') as COUNTY, A.COUNTYCODEID_TRANSLATION as NAME, A.STATEID_ABBREVIATION as [STATE], count(*) as TOTAL from V_QUERY_CONSTITUENTPRIMARYADDRESS A inner join V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT C on C.ID = A.CONSTITUENTID where 1=1 and C.ISINACTIVE = 0 and C.ISINDIVIDUAL = 1 and A.COUNTRYID_ABBREVIATION = 'USA' group by A.STATEID_ABBREVIATION, A.COUNTYCODEID_TRANSLATION order by 4 desc
